title: Minecraft Java版 19w02a 发布
author: chyx
txt_content:
本帖最后由 ff98sha 于 2019-1-23 11:17 编辑 



每周快照是Minecraft的测试机制，主要用于下一个正式版的特性预览。
然而，每周快照主要用于新特性展示，通常存在大量漏洞。因此对于普通玩家建议仅做测试尝鲜用。使用测试版打开存档前请务必备份。 适用于正式版的Mod不兼容快照，且大多数Mod都不对每周快照提供支持。
Minecraft 1.14 仍未发布，19w02a为其第13个预览版。
转载本贴时须要注明原作者以及本帖地址。




Minecraft Snapshot 19w02a 
A Village & Pillage Java Snapshot
Minecraft 快照19w02a 
村庄与掠夺 java版快照
Finally, it's time for the first snapshot of the year! While most of the Java team has been on holiday, we've still managed to cram some things into this snapshot such as smokingly hot Campfires, Cartography Table functionality and Lectern functionality. Enjoy!终于到了今年的第一个快照发布的时候了！虽然我们大多数人都放假了，但是我们仍然在这个快照加了许多东西，比如冒烟的篝火，有功能的制图台和讲台。好好玩！CHANGES IN 19W02A19w02a的变化
Added CampfireAdded Cartography Table functionalityAdded Lectern functionalityPerformance improvementsFixed bugsAdded teammsg command which sends a message to all players on your team加入了篝火让制图台有功能了讲台也是表现提升修了BUG加入了teammsg指令 向队友说话
CAMPFIRES篝火
Come one, come all, and toast your buns around the campfire!围过来，在篝火边烤点心！Decorative fireplace without fire spreadCooks up to four foods, but slowlyActs as a smoke signal you can see very (VERY!) far away when a hay bale is below (hint: think note blocks!)Cosy light sourceCan be lit/unlit不用担心失火的装饰用火同时能烧4个食物，但很慢可以作为烟雾信号，当有干草方块在下方时能在很远处看见。类似于音符盒。舒适的光源可以点燃/扑灭
CARTOGRAPHY TABLE FUNCTIONALITY实装的制图台
Fancy UI which more closely represents what the recipes actually do functionallyProvides an easier and simpler way of cloning, extending, and locking of mapsMap locking allows you to lock maps in the Cartography Table with a glass pane so that they can no longer be modified花俏的UI更好的表现配方的作用提供简单的复制，拓展，还有锁定地图的方式地图锁定让你在制图台里用一个玻璃板来不让地图再次修改（裱起来？）
LECTERN讲台
Ermahgerd berks... holder... thingy?Right-click empty lectern to place bookRight-click lectern with book to openCurrent page is persistent and shared between all readersEmits redstone pulses when page is changedUse comparator to get book reading progress右键空讲台来放书右键有书的讲台来打开书当前页所有读者都能看见在翻页时发出红石脉冲用比较器检查书的进度
TEAMMSG COMMANDTEAMMSG指令
General syntax: teammsg <message> Sends <message> to all players on the team of the player who runs the command. Available to all players on a team.格式：teammsg <message>发送 <message> 给所有执行者的队友。所有队伍里的玩家都能用。ALIAS变体
tm <message>
